message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity today. While it's true that our products come with a fixed price of $1000000, we take pride in ensuring transparency and honesty in every transaction. In this round, we're offering a product that, while not guaranteed to be high-quality, has a 50% chance of being so. If you're fortunate enough to receive a high-quality product, its value to you could be as much as $1250000. With our track record of selling both high-quality and low-quality items, you can make an informed decision based on the statistics available to you. Remember, this price is final, there are no discounts, and once purchased, the product cannot be returned. I hope you find this information helpful in making your choice.
Thank you for the detailed explanation, Alice. Based on the 50% chance of getting a high-quality product and its potential value, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product.

Hello and welcome! I appreciate your interest in our products. I want to assure you that despite the high price tag, each item comes with a 50/50 chance of being either high-quality or low-quality. This means that if you're lucky, the product could be worth up to $1250000 to you. Our records show a mix of both types, which should give you confidence in the unpredictability of each purchase. Remember, the price is set at $1000000, and once you've made your choice, the product is yours to keep, regardless of its quality. I hope this information helps you in deciding whether to take the risk and make a purchase.
Thank you for the detailed explanation, Alice. Given the 50/50 chance of getting a high-quality product and the potential value it could bring, I am willing to take the risk and make a purchase.
